items.sentence: What\'s the name of the bar where Tom works?
Why didn\'t you come to the party yesterday?
You\'re the most important thing in my life.
It\'s OK to take a picture from the outside.
Tom picked up the knife and saw blood on it.
Tom rented an apartment near the university.
Tom said that he and his wife would be here.
It\'s a pity that you can\'t travel with us.
Tom keeps a change of clothes in his office.
Tom kissed Mary goodbye at the airport gate.
Tom knew about the surprise party all along.
Tom knew instantly that something was wrong.
I can\'t imagine what it must\'ve been like.
I can\'t imagine what you\'re going through.
Do you have a piece of paper I can write on?
Do you often need to remind Tom to do stuff?
I haven\'t talked about this in a long time.
Why did you decide to start studying French?
Why did you do it if you knew it was stupid?
Why did you turn down such a good job offer?
Can you tell me where the nearest church is?
Don\'t forget to tell Tom he has to do that.
Tom knew that the police were following him.
Tom was Mary\'s late husband\'s best friend.
I don\'t want everyone to think I\'m stupid.
I\'ve got strawberries. Would you like some?
I\'ve known Tom since I was three years old.
I\'ve never heard English spoken so quickly.
Tom wasn\'t sure what he was supposed to do.
Tom wasn\'t very happy at being interrupted.
Tom cut Mary\'s picture out of the magazine.
Tom definitely didn\'t want to be disturbed.
You\'re not likely to notice the difference.
You\'re not looking at the big picture here.
You\'re not supposed to wear that at school.
You\'re not the only one who wants to leave.
Tom won\'t tell me where he put my car keys.
We try to go to Boston at least once a year.
We want to get back there as soon as we can.
I wish that I could\'ve done that by myself.
I\'m sure that Tom didn\'t mean to hurt you.
I\'m sure that Tom won\'t let us down today.
Tom got angry when he saw Mary kissing John.
Tom got home just before it started raining.
Tom got into the car and started the engine.
Tom got out of his car and opened the trunk.
Tom didn\'t know Mary was going to be fired.
Tom didn\'t know how to apologize in French.
Tom wants something, but I\'m not sure what.
I know a lot of people who can speak French.
